name: Stairsmith
description:
This is a game jam game made in 3 days for STAIR JAM.

STAIRSMITH

You as a stairsmith, help three archers with drinking problem , to escape from water goblins. Water goblins are bad. Very bad... They steal vodkas and whiskeys from our archer friends.

Gameplay

Pile up the rocks and crates to build a staircase to let our archers climb the hill.
At the same time, you need to make sure our friends are alive because oh boy, those goblins never stop. They keep coming!

Feed your archers with dropped drinks to get them upgraded! And kill the goblins by throwing rocks at them.

Known issues

+ Rocks stuck into each other sometimes
+ Goblins stuck into rocks sometimes
+ Cursor position problems when losing focus

There are many bugs since it's a game jam game. Try to tolerate them :)
Have fun!
